Articles.Content:
Hi fellow Kerbonauts,

I had a funny idea and made this Lander/Rover-Combo.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/L3nwJ)

Many Mods are included, like Tantares, Orbital Science, Infernal robotics, Tweakscale and Procedural Parts.

Hope you like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Is that... Death Star?

E: at first i thought the flare looked like it, but then i noticed the Mun. Or is it?
